DOC.brief_summary: Study prospective clinical trial evaluate efficacy Ulthera® System improve Lifting Skin Neck . Changes baseline FACE-Q Appraisal Neck scale score Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score assess study follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy Ultherapy™ System Lifting Skin Neck
DOC.detailed_description: Before Treatment : The subject 's eligibility ( inclusion/exclusion criterion ) assess , subject check FACE-Q Appraisal Neck scale score Treatment : The Investigator apply eligible subject Study Device Ultherapy™ System 200~260 line 3.0 4.5 probe respectively subject 's neck . Post-Treatment : All subject visit Institution 12 week day procedure , take photo neck . Efficacy evaluation perform Photographic Evaluator .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year . Subject good health Subjects desire improvement neck skin Presence active systemic infectious disease general disease skin disorder area treat Pregnant lactate subject Previous episode facial neck surgery wrinkle correction Subjects aesthetic addiction , drug abuse , alcohol abuse Subjects treat Botox Filler neck area Subjects AutoImmune disease
